main event: An unidentified egg-shaped object with small lights was observed over Sullivan Island for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes with a total duration of 62 seconds captured on ground radar., The object was described as having one large light and three smaller lights in formation., The weather was clear with visibility up to 10 miles., The object was reported to be erratic in its movement., The report suggested a possible balloon but deemed the data insufficient for analysis.
